metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6622 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium
metadata.Description: A null pointer dereference vulnerability was found in nft_dynset_init() innet/netfilter/nft_dynset.c in nf_tables in the Linux kernel. This issue mayallow a local attacker with CAP_NET_ADMIN user privilege to trigger adenial of service.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-kvm package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
linux-allwinner: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of life').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected and may need fixing.
